name: Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder
description: The Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder offers professional video quality in a compact and versatile design. Equipped with a 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor and a DIGIC DV 6 image processor, the HF G50 captures 4K Ultra HD video at 30p resolution, providing detailed and vibrant footage. It features a 20x optical zoom lens with a 35mm equivalent focal length of 29.3 to 601.2mm, allowing for versatile shooting from wide-angle to telephoto. The camcorder also includes a 3.0-inch LCD touchscreen for easy menu navigation and a range of manual controls for advanced shooting techniques. With dual SD card slots for extended recording times, built-in Wi-Fi for easy file sharing, and a range of creative shooting modes, the VIXIA HF G50 is ideal for both casual users and content creators seeking high-quality 4K video recording. The HF G50 also includes features such as image stabilization, slow-motion recording, and various frame rate options for a professional filming experience.
